EmailInputEdit: Also, as a recommendation to prevent future files from corruption during the scanning process of a specific case, please avoid excessive back-and-forth navigation.
Issue: complaint of an existing case, with the sent button missing no able to continue with the process
Probing Questions (Add Info):
She renew the licenses on this case

This issue is with 3 different cases
RC: The Trios Module was block due the creation and renew of the licenses
Solution: We reinstall the Trios Module to refresh the connection.
Step 1: Go to the case and create a copy of that case
Step 10: It does not fix the issue
Step 13: We was able to send the case
Step 2: Try to send the copy but it doesn't work
Step 3: Went to the Event Log and found the case mentioned by the customer
Step 4: Located the case id in the Event Logs
Step 5: Create a new case and reimport the streams but the send button do not appear
Step 6: Delete and add again the SendTo DME on settings but it does not fix the issue
Step 7: Looking on logs and ERR was create where the password and username for the 3Shape Communicate was wrong
Step 8: Test the connection and send the same error
Step 9: Check and change the password on the Unite software
